**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 171 1.1 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- The crystal chamber within this split geode is divided into three lobes of equal size. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 17.
  • **Armor** After you cast an [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55) spell by Activating the _geode_, you gain resistance 1 to physical damage (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374)) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.
  • **Weapon** After you cast an earth spell by Activating the _geode_, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.
Trinity Geode **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 171 1.1 **Price** 60 gp Trinity Geode (Greater) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 171 1.1 **Price** 460 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 3, extra damage affixed to a weapon is 1d6, and spell DC is 24. Trinity Geode (Major) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 171 1.1 **Price** 1,900 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 5, extra damage when affixed to a weapon is 1d8, and spell DC is 29.
